page.title: 16P.C Culverhouse
page.content: The police work from 6am-2pm then from 2pm-10pm then 10pm-6am morning.He works a 7 day week with two days off.A unicar panda car goes around the streets and if anything happens they have to radio Berkhamsted police station.They walk the High Street and man the streets.On a normal day the policeman will be at the police station at 6am then look at the messages from people who call the police,from the radio and from the telex.Then when he has done that he goes out and does work.The work might be boring or you might have to deal with road accidents,stolen cars or property that has been lost or found,lost cars or found cars,burglaries.You have to do this on any shift that you are on.
